entry.title: Vite report on Sat, 25 Nov 2023 08:03:27
entry.summary:
Tech:
- Show HN: IP Guide – info on IP addresses, Networks, and ASNs
- Asus Intros GeForce RTX 4060 Ti Video Card with Integrated M.2 SSD Slot
- How to get notified of newly connected devices on your OpenWRT router
- Show HN: Perfect Pitch Puzzle – a musical Wordle daily ear training game
- Android Circuit: Galaxy Unpacked Dates, Redmagic 9 Pro Launch, Pixel 8 Pro Problems
- Fire TV now also displays full-screen video ads on its homescreen
- Lean Startup y MVPs: Soluciones Ágiles para el Desarrollo de Software

Key points:
- IP Guide provides information on IP addresses, networks, and ASNs.
- Asus has introduced a new video card with an integrated M.2 SSD slot.
- OpenWRT router users can learn how to receive notifications for newly connected devices.
- Perfect Pitch Puzzle is a musical Wordle game for daily ear training.
- Android Circuit highlights Galaxy Unpacked dates, Redmagic 9 Pro launch, and Pixel 8 Pro problems.
- Fire TV now displays full-screen video ads on its homescreen.
- Lean Startup and MVPs offer agile solutions for software development.

Insights:
- The tech section covers a range of topics, including networking, hardware, software, and mobile devices.
- The introduction of new products and features in the tech industry is ongoing.
- The integration of different technologies, such as video cards and SSDs, is becoming more common.
- User experience and advertising are important considerations in tech products and services.
- Agile development methodologies like Lean Startup and MVPs are gaining popularity in software development.

Business:
- Why ServiceNow Shares Have Rallied 27% Since The Recent Earnings Report
- RMWD General Manager Wiley appointed to SDCWA Board - Fallbrook / Bonsall Villlage News
- Former NFL Star Marcellus Wiley Faces Rape Allegations - Black Enterprise
- 2024 NFL Draft: Trade Scenarios and Best Prospect Fits for League's Worst Teams - Bleacher Report
- RHOBH Newbie Annemarie Wiley's Husband Marcellus Wiley Accused of Raping Fellow Columbia Student in 1994 - Yahoo Entertainment

Key points:
- ServiceNow shares have experienced a 27% rally following a recent earnings report.
- RMWD General Manager Wiley has been appointed to the SDCWA Board.
- Former NFL star Marcellus Wiley is facing rape allegations.
- The 2024 NFL Draft trade scenarios and best prospect fits are discussed.
- Marcellus Wiley, husband of RHOBH newbie Annemarie Wiley, is accused of raping a fellow Columbia student in 1994.

Insights:
- The business section covers a range of topics, including stock market performance, board appointments, and legal issues.
- The performance of a company's shares can be influenced by earnings reports.
- Individuals in prominent positions may face allegations and legal challenges.
- Sports-related events, such as the NFL Draft, generate significant interest and speculation.
- Personal and legal issues involving public figures can attract media attention.

AI:
- Show HN: Perfect Pitch Puzzle – a musical Wordle daily ear training game

Key points:
- Perfect Pitch Puzzle is an AI-powered game that helps with daily ear training.
- The game utilizes AI algorithms to generate musical puzzles for users to solve.

Insights:
- AI technology is being used in various applications, including gaming and music.
- AI algorithms can enhance user experiences and provide personalized challenges.
- Daily practice and training can improve skills in specific areas, such as music.

Summary of insights:
- The tech section highlights advancements in networking, hardware, software, and mobile devices.
- The business section covers stock market performance, board appointments, and legal issues.
- The AI section focuses on an AI-powered game for musical ear training.
- Overall, the report showcases the ongoing developments and challenges in the tech, business, and AI sectors.
